thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by Shirley Ramirez

author: Shirley Ramirez
title: Shirley Ramirez
text: Always there for me, always called me back very satisfied with the out come. They were very helpful with everything the people that I worked with were the greatest. I would recommend them highly. I appreciate everything they have done for us.Thanks. Shirley Ramirez
